description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              - Promote, sell & market for food, personal care, chemical & additive, plastic resins
              
              - Identify new markets and business opportunities
              
              - Service existing accounts, obtains orders
              
              - Establish good relationship with customers & principals
              
              - Ensure monthly targets are met
              
              - Keep management informed by submitting activity and results reports
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              Education Level: Diploma in Chemical Process Engineering or Sales & Marketing or equivalent
              
              Experience Level: At least 02 years
              

              Required Experience/Skills Detail
              
              - Candidate must possess Diploma in Chemical Engineering or Sales & Marketing or equivalent
              
              - Prefer with Chemical  background
              
              - Able to work independently under minimal supervision
              
              - Excellent communication and good interpersonal skill
              
              - Highly self motivated and ambitious in achieving goals
              
              - Willing to travel
              

              How To Contact:
              
              Apply Online, Apply by Attachment, Direct (Trực Tuyến, Đính Kèm Qua Mail, Hoặc Trực Tiếp)
              
              Apply Online, Apply by Attachment resume with picture via VietnamWorks
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
phuc-loi:
Các Phúc Lợi Dành Cho Bạn
             








                Negotiable
               







                Dynamic working environment
